Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell is an attractive, efficient, alternative source of power generation.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: However several challenges remained for this technology to be viable.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: These challenges include high power density, degradation rate, and cost.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: One way to decrease the SOFC cost is to use stainless steel interconnector.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: To be able to use a stainless steel interconnector one of the challenges is to find a way to produce an electrolyte, which does not need sintering at high temperature.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: This work presents the results of the process applied to gadolinia-doped ceria thin films deposited in cycles by spray pyrolysis.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The aim of this work was to obtain thin, dense, and continuous CGO coatings, which has electrochemical performance suitable to be used as electrolyte for SOFC.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The results obtained show that the air flow rate influenced the droplets size and hence the film quality.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction analysis showed that the films were crystalline after the deposition.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Electrochemical tests showed maximum power density of 510 mW cm(-2) at 650 C with a thickness average of 3.30 mu m when the film was deposited in 12 cycles showing that the film has a potential to be used as an electrolyte for ITSOFC on metal support.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte thin films for ITSOFC deposited by spray pyrolysis
